title: Github Champion
description: This is the Github Champion actor's input schema

REPOSITORIES.title: Repositories
REPOSITORIES.description: A JSON array of repository names. E.g. "apify-docs"

REPOSITORY_OWNER.title: Repository owner
REPOSITORY_OWNER.description: The owner's or organization's name. E.g. "apify"

NUMBER_OF_WEEKS.title: Number of weeks
NUMBER_OF_WEEKS.description: The number of weeks, from the day of the actor's run, to monitor. E.g. If you would like to monitor the activity from the past 4 weeks, enter 4. Defaults to 2.
